resources.string: Technical error – Please try again later
This mobile no is already exist.
Login failed. Please check your mobile no.
Technical error – Please try again later
I have read and agree to terms and condition for using this app
If you already registered, please login with registered 10 digits mobile number. otherwise click on "Sign Up" for register yourself.
Are you sure, you want to delete your plan?
Start location and end location can not be same.
Total No of person can not be empty or zero.
Total No of person can not be greater than 10.
Internent connection is not avaiable.Please try later.

By downloading or otherwise accessing the LetsGoo App you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. If you do not comply or agree with these Terms and Conditions, you should stop using the App and uninstall it with immediate effect. 

Sole motive of this App is to provide ride partner(s) for the same destination travel. This would save money for the travellers who otherwise would be travelling and paying alone. The App function will be limited to connect the two interested travelers by sharing their mobile numbers. 

It is travellers’ onus to verify the mobile contact and then choose to share the ride. It is left for travelers’ judgment to select the ride partner and App doesn’t control, in anyway, whom you choose to travel with. 

The App may contain links to websites/services operated by third parties. You may or may not choose to avail these offerings; App or App owners have no control on these services. 

Your contacts details are safe with us.We promise not to use your personal information for any commercial use. 

We reserves the right to suspend or cease providing any services relating to the apps published by it, with or without notice, and shall have no liability or responsibility to you in any manner whatsoever if it chooses to do so.
